content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1614880518956{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Zagreb grad milijun srca

Zagreb je glavni grad Hrvatske i grad s više od 900 godina zadivljujuće povijesti. Snažan austro-ugarski utjecaj na lokalnu kulturu vidljiv je svugdje, posebice u lijepoj arhitekturi i bogatstvu muzeja. Prošećite povijesnom jezgrom grada, upijajući okus slikovitog labirinta ulica obrubljenih tipičnim kafićima i restoranima. Uzmite jedan dan za istraživanje idilične jadranske obale, ili provedite večer punu čarolije u Hrvatskom narodnom kazalištu; očekuje vas cijeli niz fantastičnih iskustava u ovom prelijepom glavnom gradu ispunjenom rijetkim i neočekivanim užicima.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1654689153381{padding-top: 110px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

History & Culture Impressive after 900 years

Zagreb history lasts for nine centuries. Its name was mentioned for the first time in 1094, when Hungarian king Ladislaus 1st found a diocese on Kaptol hill.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Zagreb Architecture so many great things to see

Zagreb architecture, with cobbled streets and host of museums and churches at the Baroque Upper Town offers a fascinating glimpse of the birth of the city, while the Lenucci’s Horseshoe grid of pretty parks remind visitors of the pride Zagrebans take in all outdoor spaces.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Zagreb Museums Treasures of history

Top Zagreb Museums include the Museum of Broken Relationships - which both celebrates and mourns marriage and love affair break-ups - the crowd-pulling Museum of Contemporary Art and the Museum of Arts and Crafts; which celebrates the city’s creative heritage.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Shopping in Zagreb From antiques, famous designer shops to outlets

Niche retailers as well as top designer brands are to be found at Ilica, off the main square, and for a wealth of locally-produced curios and souvenirs, this is the place to be.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Entertainment in Zagreb pretty much everything

Whether you are here in time for the Strossmartre summer street festival or the exquisite Christmas market and ice skating that lights up the City in winter, Zagreb entertainment will never disappoint.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Advent in Zagreb Glittery Festive Season

Experience the festive wonders of Advent as a special kind of magic overflows Zagreb's squares, streets and parks transforming into shiny colourful fairy tale Christmas markets.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Zagreb Nightlife Discover street cafes and trendy bars

Make a plan to have fun, get going across this unforgettable city that does not sleep at night and experience Zagreb in a truly different way.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

How to Arrive in Zagreb? By air, by road or by train

There are daily regular flights from majority of European cities to Zagreb International Airport, which is just 20-25 minutes away from the hotel. Central bus station is situated just 10 minutes from the hotel and the main railway station is next to the hotel.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Weather in Zagreb A bit of rain, snow, wind… and a lot of sunshine...

Zagreb weather can be defined by its four seasons and it enjoys a mild climate with lots of sunshine.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Do Not Miss! Zagreb just wants to have fun

This fascinating 900-year-old city offers you many interesting events which you don’t want to miss when in Croatia.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Did You Know? Cool stuff. Inventions. Successful people.

There are some fun and interesting facts about Croatia, its people, culture, geography and history. Check them out…

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More

Incentive Adventure and excitement

The staff’s expertise and attention to detail, coupled with the hotel’s spectacular facilities, service and location, make the Esplanade Zagreb an unbeatable destination for a business incentive trip.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1663930592829{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1654592161275{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″]

Dodajte tome ponosno kulinarsko naslijeđe i odličan noćni život i dobit ćete nezaboravan odmor u još neotkrivenom kutku Europe.

Upoznajte Zagreb. Od njegove globalno pohvaljene zbirke koncerata, festivala i muzeja, do urbanog izletišta svjetske klase na jezeru Jarun, hrvatska prijestolnica ima sve.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1655201681422{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

Kontaktirajte nas

[vc_column_text]

Dođite k nama za informacije o restoranima, klubovima, gradskim događanjima, kazalištu, koncertima, izletima, sportskim natjecanjima, ulaznicama, frizerskim salonima i gotovo bilo čemu drugom.

Kontaktirajte Conciergea:

T. +385 1 45 66 055
E. concierge@esplanade.hr

 

Ili posjetite službene stranice Turističke zajednice grada Zagreba..

Pratite nas. Podijelite svoju priču.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
